Symptoms.name: Peak Severity
Symptoms.explanation: How bad your migraine was at its worst point

Symptoms.name: Migraine Duration
Symptoms.fieldDescription: the number of hours your migraine lasted

Symptoms.name: Aura
Symptoms.explanation: Aura experience today (recommended only if you sometimes experience aura)

Symptoms.name: Nausea
Symptoms.explanation: Nausea experience today (recommended only if you sometimes experience nausea)

Symptoms.name: Lightheadedness/Dizziness
Symptoms.explanation: Lightheadedness/dizziness experience today (recommended only if you sometimes experience lightheadedness/dizziness)

Symptoms.name: Migraine Impact on Disability
Symptoms.explanation: Whether your migraine prevented you from doing the things you wanted or needed to do today

Symptoms.name: Brain Fog
Symptoms.explanation: "Brain fog" experience today (recommended only if you sometimes experience brain fog)

Symptoms.name: Location
Symptoms.explanation: Where the pain was (right or left side, eyes, forehead, temples, face, back of head, neck, all over)
Symptoms.fieldDescription: Text box where you can describe the location

Symptoms.name: Light Sensitivity
Symptoms.explanation: Light sensitivity experience today (only recommended if that's a symptom you experience)

Symptoms.name: Sound Sensitivity
Symptoms.explanation: Sound sensitivity experience today (only recommended if that's a symptom you experience)

Symptoms.name: Quality of the Pain
Symptoms.explanation: What the pain was like (pulsating/throbbing, pressure, tension, stabbing, sharp, dull, burning, other)
Symptoms.fieldDescription: Text box where you can describe the pain

Treatments.name: As-needed medications today
Treatments.explanation: Any medication you take on an as-needed basis (in response to symptoms).  For example: Advil, Excedrin, Tylenol, prescription medications you don't take regularly.
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you took any as-needed medication today

Treatments.name: Routine Medication Use
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you took any routine medication today

Treatments.name: Supplements
Treatments.explanation: Whether you took migraine prevention supplements today (for example, magnesium, riboflavin, vitamin B12, vitamin D)

Treatments.name: Stress Management
Treatments.explanation: Any stress management you engaged in today (for example, yoga, meditation)
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you did any stress management (yes/no)

Treatments.name: Nutrition Today
Treatments.explanation: Whether you ate healthily today. For example, we recommend 4-5 servings of veggies, eating regular meals, avoiding sugar

Treatments.name: Warm/cold Compress on Head/Neck
Treatments.explanation: Whether you used a warm/cold compress on your head or neck to treat symptoms
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you used a warm/cold compress (yes/no)

Treatments.name: Warm/Cold shower
Treatments.explanation: Whether you took a warm/cold shower to treat symptoms
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you took a warm/cold shower (yes/no)

Treatments.name: Relax in a Dark Room
Treatments.explanation: Whether you relaxed in a dark room to treat symptoms
Treatments.fieldDescription: Whether you relaxed in a dark room (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Frequent Use of Medications
Contributors.explanation: Calculated medication use, to let you know if you might want to think about cutting back.
Contributors.significance: If you use as-needed medications too frequently, they can start causing more migraines.

Contributors.name: Stress
Contributors.significance: High stress levels can lead to more migraines

Contributors.name: Caffeine
Contributors.explanation: How much caffeine you had today

Contributors.name: Alcohol
Contributors.explanation: How much alcohol you had today

Contributors.name: Sleep
Contributors.explanation: How much sleep you got today

Contributors.name: Interrupted Routine
Contributors.explanation: Whether your routine was interrupted today

Contributors.name: Contributing Activities
Contributors.explanation: Whether you did any activities that can contribute to symptoms (like screen time, vigorous exercise that you’re not used to, or long periods of concentration)

Contributors.name: Depressive Symptoms
Contributors.explanation: Whether you had a depressed mood today
Contributors.fieldDescription: Whether you had a depressed mood (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Anxiety
Contributors.explanation: Whether you had symptoms of anxiety today
Contributors.fieldDescription: Whether you had symptoms of anxiety (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Bright Light
Contributors.explanation: Whether you were exposed to bright light today
Contributors.fieldDescription: Whether you were exposed to bright light (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Loud Sound
Contributors.explanation: Whether you were exposed to loud sound today
Contributors.fieldDescription: Whether you were exposed to loud sound (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Intense Smell
Contributors.explanation: Whether you were exposed to an intense smell today
Contributors.fieldDescription: Whether you were exposed to an intense smell (yes/no)

Contributors.name: Environmental Allergies
Contributors.explanation: Whether you had environmental allergies today

Changes.name: Starting Supplements
Changes.explanation: Whether you took migraine prevention supplements today (for example, magnesium, riboflavin, vitamin B12, vitamin D)

Changes.name: Managing Stress
Changes.explanation: Any stress management you engaged in today (for example, yoga, meditation)
Changes.fieldDescription: Whether you did any stress management (yes/no)

Changes.name: Eating a More Healthy Diet
Changes.explanation: Whether you ate healthily today. For example, we recommend 4-5 servings of veggies, eating regular meals, avoiding sugar

Changes.name: Increasing Sleep
Changes.explanation: How much sleep you got today

Changes.name: New As-Needed Medication
Changes.explanation: Any new as-needed medication you're starting
Changes.fieldDescription: Whether you took your new as-needed medication today

Changes.name: New Routine Medication
Changes.explanation: Any new routine medication (like a daily preventative medication) you're starting
Changes.fieldDescription: Whether you took your new routine medication today

Other.name: Whether as-needed medication worked
Other.explanation: Whether your as-needed medication improved your symptoms

Other.name: Other notes
Other.explanation: Anything else you want to note about today
Other.fieldDescription: Text box where you can record any notes
